resources.string: Narendra Modi, born on September 17, 1950, in Vadnagar, Gujarat, is the 14th Prime Minister of India, serving since 2014.As Prime Minister, he has launched major initiatives such as Make in India, Digital India, and Swachh Bharat Abhiyan, focusing on economic reforms, social welfare, infrastructure, national security, and elevating Indiaâ€™s global diplomatic stature. Known for his powerful oratory and charismatic leadership, Modi remains a pivotal figure in modern Indian politics.
